resources.string: Hello, I am your sidekick! My goal is to serve as a guide for parents to teach their children to become independent! Autistic children are often ill-prepared to take care of themselves by the time they finish their education and come of age. Their education usually does not provide them with many important daily skills that your child will need to take care of himself and participate as a member of society. Together, we can better prepare your child to become an independent individual who can take on the world. I will provide you with a guide on what needs to be improved while you supervise your child’s training process and monitor his improvement. The earlier we start, the better!

The goal of My Lil Sidekick is to serve as a guide for parents to teach their children to become independent. Autistic children are often ill-prepared to take care of themselves by the time they finish their education and come of age. Their education usually does not provide them with many important daily skills that your child will need to take care of himself and participate as a member of society. You will be provided with guidance on what needs to be improved while you supervise your child’s training process and monitor his improvement as he grows closer to becoming an independent individual. The earlier you start, the better!
